translation.en: ♪ I can feel it ♪ ♪ Coming in the air tonight ♪
[man] Just when you think it's all over,
translation.fr: Quand tu crois que c'est fini,

translation.en: something unspeakable comes after you and your family,
translation.fr:
un truc atroce s'abat
sur toi et ta famille,

translation.en: murders your sister Jenny in cold blood,
translation.fr: tue de sang-froid ta sœur, Jenny,

translation.en: and disappears into thin air.
But a clue left behind leads us here,
translation.fr: Mais un indice nous a menés ici,

translation.en: to this club in Bangkok.
And that's why we still need the Wu Assassin.
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça qu'on encore besoin
du Wu Assassin.

translation.en: [woman] What's a Wu Assassin?
[man] All right. So about a year ago,
translation.fr: Il y a environ un an,

translation.en: my friends and I were living it up in San Francisco.
translation.fr:
on passait du bon temps
à San Francisco.

translation.en: Uh, my sister, Jenny, and I, we ran this restaurant,
translation.fr:
Ma sœur Jenny et moi,
on avait un restaurant

translation.en: and, um, my boy Lu Xin, he ran cars,
translation.fr: et mon pote Lu Xin possédait un garage

translation.en: until she showed up.
A 10,000-year-old warrior spirit brought back to Earth.
translation.fr:
Une guerrière vieille de 10 000 ans
ramenée à la vie.

translation.en: And then she gave her powers to Kai, my best friend.
translation.fr:
Elle a transmis ses pouvoirs à Kai,
mon meilleur ami.

translation.en: And then he became the last Wu Assassin. Whatever.
translation.fr:
Il est devenu le dernier Wu Assassin.
Ou autre.

translation.en: What, like The Avengers?
-Yeah. -Hmm. -But Asian. -Hmm.
Actually, no. More like that show from the '70s.
translation.fr: Plutôt comme la série des années 1970.

translation.en: Kai and Lu Xin are the Angels. I'm like Charlie.
translation.fr:
Kai et Lu Xin sont mes drôles de dames
et je suis Charlie.

translation.en: So what kind of mission?
Um, it's a supernatural one.
Sounds dangerous.
[man] It's what we do.
-[man 2] You seeing this? -[man 3] You know why we're here.
translation.fr:
Tu vois ça ?
Ils savent pourquoi on est là.

translation.en: So your friend Kai…
-What about him? -This Wu Assassin.
He's got to have some kind of powers, right?
[man] He's empowered by this thing called the Dao.
translation.fr: Il tire ses pouvoirs du Tao.

translation.en: He's faster and stronger than any man. He calls himself Death's Instrument.
translation.fr:
Il est plus rapide et fort que quiconque.
Il se surnomme l'instrument de la mort.

translation.en: And your other friend?
Oh no, he's just really good at kicking ass.
translation.fr: Il se bat bien, c'est tout.

translation.en: So why aren't you with them?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu n'es pas avec eux ?

translation.en: This seems more dangerous.
Do you want to continue your story somewhere else?
translation.fr: Tu veux continuer ton histoire ailleurs ?

translation.en: Hell, yeah.
What about your friends?
They'll be fine.
I think.
I fucking love Thailand.
Why Bangkok? I mean, what's here?
Answers.
I, uh, traced this material back to Thailand.
translation.fr:
J'ai remonté
la piste d'un matériau jusqu'ici.

translation.en: It's from an ancient, old piece of stone.
Kai! Up there! He's turning them.
Jiangshi.
Chi vampire.
translation.fr: Un vampire qui absorbe le Chi.

translation.en: -What's so special about this? -[scoffs]
[man] I found it in my dead sister's hand.
Kai, Lu Xin, and I came back to my family restaurant,
translation.fr:
Kai, Lu Xin et moi sommes rentrés
au restaurant familial

translation.en: and she was just there, dead on the ground.
translation.fr: et elle gisait morte sur le sol.

translation.en: Well, here's to your sister.
You want to know a secret?
Sure.
[whispering] Come here.
I don't drink anymore.
This will turn you into a Jiangshi, won't it?
translation.fr: Ça va te transformer en Jiangshi ?

translation.en: [breathing heavily] I just want to talk.
Your powers don't work on me.
Who killed Jenny? [grunting]
Who killed my sister?
-He's not talking! -Ah! [grunts]
Assassin's strike.
That's not what I was thinking at all.
translation.fr: Je n'avais pas ça en tête.

translation.en: Yo. Hey, hey! What is this? Yo! Press the start button, man.
translation.fr: C'est quoi, ça ? Appuie sur lecture, mec.

translation.en: This isn't me.
It's me. I need your help.
[Lu Xin] You? Who are you?
[man's voice] No, I'm speaking through them.
I can't hold it for long.
It's not safe to put myself out here like this.
What do you want?
[man's voice] Not here.
8:00 a.m. Silom Temple archaeological dig site.
translation.fr:
À 8 h au site de fouilles
du temple Silom.

translation.en: We have much to discuss, Wu Assassin.
translation.fr:
Nous avons beaucoup de choses
à nous dire.

translation.en: I am never coming to a club with you ever again.
translation.fr: Je n'irai plus jamais en boîte avec toi.

translation.en: -Who was that? -We should call Tommy.
[Tommy] Stop the van!
Yeah. She didn't know anything.
What about your Jiangshi?
I guess we finally have a lead.
The archaeological site is owned by this biotech billionaire.
translation.fr:
Le site de fouilles appartient
à un magnat de la biotechnologie.

translation.en: Not much else on him, but he owns that building.
translation.fr:
Pas d'autres infos,
mais il possède ce bâtiment.

translation.en: So, uh, we're just going to roll onto his turf?
translation.fr: On va débarquer sur son terrain ?

translation.en: If it gets us closer to Jenny's killer, that's all that matters.
translation.fr:
Si ça peut nous rapprocher
 du tueur de Jenny.

translation.en: Looks shady as fuck.
[Tommy] It should be up on the right.
Guessing he's not the valet.
[narrator] Since founding his firm in 1999,
translation.fr: Depuis la création de sa firme en 1999,

translation.en: William Pan has formed collaboration agreements
translation.fr:
William Pan a conclu
des accords de coopération

translation.en: with the world's largest companies.
Providing scientists the opportunity and resources
translation.fr:
permettant aux scientifiques
d'avoir des ressources

translation.en: to tackle humankind's most perplexing problems.
translation.fr:
pour s'attaquer aux problèmes
les plus déroutants

translation.en: All in service of William's unique vision.
translation.fr: au service de la vision unique de William.

translation.en: One people,
one world,
one planet.
We're not just looking to the future…
we're looking to shape it.
Thank you for coming.
I know my message was unorthodox.
I apologize for not meeting you in person. Communicating like that was difficult.
translation.fr:
Excusez ce procédé.
Communiquer ainsi a été compliqué.

translation.en: Dr. William Pan.
Do you know the story of Pan Gu?
translation.fr: Vous connaissez l'histoire de Pan Gu ?

translation.en: [Tommy] Yeah, we do.
The first man to shape the universe from the great nothingness
translation.fr:
Le premier homme ayant créé l'univers
à parti du néant

translation.en: and made the heavens, the Earth, and the seas.
translation.fr: ainsi que le ciel, la terre, les mers.

translation.en: We all went to Chinese school.
translation.fr: On a tous été en école chinoise.

translation.en: Chinese school didn't teach you what happened to Pan Gu
translation.fr:
Mais vous ignorez
ce qui est arrivé à Pan Gu

translation.en: after he became a god.
He went mad with power.
Threatened to remake the world in his own image.
translation.fr: Il voulait modeler le monde à son image.

translation.en: But the Dao,
in its infinite celestial wisdom,
called upon the first Wu Assassin to strike down that first man.
translation.fr:
a fait appel au premier Wu Assassin
pour faucher le premier homme.

translation.en: Yin and yang. Chaos and order.
translation.fr: Le yin et le yang. Le chaos et l'ordre.

translation.en: These spirits have clashed for millennia.
translation.fr:
Ces forces s'affrontent
depuis des millénaires.

translation.en: I'm not the first vessel.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas le premier hôte.

translation.en: But thanks to you, I am the last.
translation.fr: Mais grâce à toi, je suis le dernier.

translation.en: And with the world left unbalanced,
chaos and I can finally complete our unending war.
translation.fr:
le chaos et moi pouvons enfin
mettre un terme à notre conflit.

translation.en: I was attacked.
Barely made it out alive.
And that's why I've retreated here for safety,
while my twin continues to spread chaos.
translation.fr: pendant que mon double sème le chaos.

translation.en: Who is he?
She.
Yin and yang.
You might have heard of her. Ku An Qi.
translation.fr: Vous devez la connaître. Ku An Qi.

translation.en: Queen of the Bangkok underworld.
She's going global. Taking out any threats to her.
translation.fr:
Elle s'exporte.
Éliminant tous ceux sur sa route.

translation.en: Consuming Chi to build her power.
translation.fr:
S'abreuvant de Chi
pour accroître son pouvoir.

translation.en: The Shaolin in China. The Druids in Ireland.
translation.fr:
Le Shaolin en Chine.
Les Druides en Irlande.

translation.en: And last month, she went to San Francisco.
translation.fr: Et le mois dernier, San Francisco.

translation.en: Ku An Qi was looking for you,
but your friend intervened.
Jenny.
She fought valiantly.
But Ku cannot be stopped.
translation.fr: Mais on ne peut pas arrêter Ku.

translation.en: She will continue her rampage if left unchecked.
translation.fr:
Le carnage ne prendra pas fin
si on ne fait rien.

translation.en: How do you know all this?
[William] Because Ku and I are connected.
That is why I must be careful.
If I open myself up to her, she will come.
translation.fr: Si je m'ouvre, elle viendra à moi.

translation.en: Follow me.
This whole thing could be bullshit.
[William] In the fight, your sister took something of Ku's, a talisman.
translation.fr:
Dans la bagarre, votre sœur a volé
quelque chose à Ku, son talisman.

translation.en: I have the other half.
I assume you have hers.
What's it matter to you?
It's a piece of our Essence.
-She'll try to get it back. -Good. Send her my way.
translation.fr:
- Elle voudra le récupérer.
- Qu'elle vienne.

translation.en: In two days' time, my worse half
translation.fr:
Dans deux jours, elle rencontre
deux membres des Cinq Triades

translation.en: is meeting the heads of the Five Triads at the Vie Hotel,
translation.fr:
Dans deux jours, elle rencontre
deux membres des Cinq Triades au Vie Hotel,
consolidant ainsi son assise.

translation.en: solidifying her power base.
translation.fr:
au Vie Hotel,
consolidant ainsi son assise.

translation.en: Cameras everywhere, no weapons allowed.
translation.fr:
Des caméras partout,
aucune arme autorisée.

translation.en: -There's no honor in guns. -And won't she know what you're up to?
translation.fr:
- Les armes n'ont rien d'honorable.
- Elle le sait ?

translation.en: I'm doing my best to shield my thoughts from her.
translation.fr: Je l'empêche d'accéder à mes pensées.

translation.en: My powers extend to the mind,
while hers are focused on the body.
translation.fr: et les siens sont surtout physiques.

translation.en: A kidnapping mission in broad daylight.
Hotel security,
the five bosses of the Triads, their whole crews.
translation.fr: les chefs des Triades, leurs hommes.

translation.en: You know what?
I got a better idea.
translation.fr:
J'ai une meilleure idée.
Servez-vous de vos pouvoirs

translation.en: Why don't you do the mind control thing and send an army after them?
translation.fr:
J'ai une meilleure idée.
Servez-vous de vos pouvoirs et envoyez une armée.

translation.en: [William] I can't control an army.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas faire ça.

translation.en: I can reach out, communicate, hold a thought for a minute.
translation.fr:
Je peux communiquer,
contrôler les pensées une minute.

translation.en: -[Lu Xin sighs] -But that is the extent of my powers now.
Well, it seems like you got all the answers, but the answers.
translation.fr:
Vous avez des réponses,
mais pas de solutions.

translation.en: We're in.
When you subdue Ku, you bring her to me with the talisman,
translation.fr:
Quand vous l'aurez enlevée,
amenez le talisman

translation.en: and I'll take care of the rest.
You said the Dao is broken. [William] Yes.
translation.fr:
- Vous avez dit que le Tao est cassé.
- Oui.

translation.en: But you and I together, maybe we can restore it.
translation.fr:
Mais ensemble,
nous pourrons peut-être le réparer.

translation.en: Or we let it be broken.
And I kill her.
[Lu Xin] The hotel, it's a death trap.
Yeah, but it's the person, demigod, whatever, who murdered Jenny.
translation.fr:
Oui mais c'est elle, la demi-déesse,
qui a tué Jenny.

translation.en: Yes, I understand that, which is why we need to be smart about it.
translation.fr:
Je sais bien,
c'est pour ça qu'il faut réfléchir.

translation.en: -Look at the pieces in front of us. -This isn't a game.
translation.fr:
- Il faut tout étudier.
- Ce n'est pas un jeu.

translation.en: Actually, it is a game. Everything is a game, Tommy.
translation.fr: En fait, si. Tout est un jeu.

translation.en: We have the perfect opportunity right now. We should take advantage of it.
If you have a death wish because of your sister, don't drag me--
translation.fr: Si tu veux mourir à cause de ta sœur…

translation.en: You act like you don't care about Jenny at all!
-[Lu Xin] That's the game. No one's safe. -[Tommy] Ah, fuck you, man.
translation.fr:
- Personne n'est à l'abri.
- Va te faire.

translation.en: -Yeah, fuck you too. -[Kai] Guys! Calm down.
I'm calm!
Ku An Qi wants the Wu Assassin. I'll give her the Wu Assassin. Myself.
translation.fr:
Ku An Qi veut le Wu Assassin.
Je vais lui livrer moi-même.

translation.en: We're going together.
-No. -It might not be the smartest choice,
but, look, this is the only opportunity we have.
translation.fr: Mais c'est la seule occasion qu'on a.

translation.en: Fuck that. No way. I'll do this one alone.
translation.fr:
Rien à foutre.
Hors de question. J'y vais seul.

translation.en: You know what your problem is, Kai?
translation.fr:
Tu connais ton problème ?
Parce que tu as des pouvoirs,

translation.en: You think because you have powers, you're better than us.
translation.fr:
Tu connais ton problème ?
Parce que tu as des pouvoirs, tu te crois supérieur.

translation.en: Like we're just some kind of fucking burden.
translation.fr: Comme si on était des boulets.

translation.en: Lu Xin is calling his contact.
Can he get a rocket launcher to take Ku down?
You never know, with magic.
translation.fr: On ne sait jamais avec la magie.

translation.en: But I guess this worked.
Let me show you something.
translation.fr: Je vais te montrer un truc.

translation.en: Keep this finger loose. It'll make it easier.
translation.fr: Détends ce doigt. Ce sera plus simple.

translation.en: Try that.
I'm coming. I don't care what you say.
translation.fr: Je viens. Peu importe ce que tu en dis.

translation.en: I have to go. Okay?
[Kai] Look, Tommy.
You go angry, you get yourself killed.
translation.fr: Si la colère prend le dessus, tu mourras.

translation.en: That's… that's not how you fight.
translation.fr: On ne se bat pas comme ça.

translation.en: You got to understand, though, man.
It's the only thing I have.
Anger.
Sorry to break up the tanning session, boys.
translation.fr:
Il faut que j'interrompe
la séance de bronzage.

translation.en: Bad news. [sighs] The dude who outfitted us for the Jiangshi mission blocked me.
translation.fr:
Le type qui nous a battus
lors de la mission Jiangshi m'a bloqué.

translation.en: Too much heat at the club.
Anyone else?
I mean, as soon as they hear we're going after Ku An Qi,
translation.fr:
Quand ils sauront
qu'on s'attaque à Ku An Qi,

translation.en: they lose my number fast.
I might know someone crazy enough to help.
translation.fr:
Je connais une fille assez folle
pour accepter.

translation.en: What? Since when did you get a Bangkok hookup?
translation.fr: Depuis quand tu as des coups à Bangkok ?

translation.en: I said "might." I'll hit her up.
Something just doesn't feel right about this.
translation.fr: Tout ça ne me paraît pas réglo.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Something smells good.
-Whoa,. -[Tommy] Thank you so much.
What's Preeya look like anyway?
Like that.
Hey! How are you?
-Hey! -It's been a long time. What's happen--
Now we've got that over with.
What's up, Thomas?
Uh, first, why are we meeting here?
translation.fr: Thomas ? Pourquoi on se voit ici ?

translation.en: Oh, you know, support the local economy.
Plus, it's out in the open. Can't be
translation.fr: Et puis, c'est un lieu public.

translation.en: too careful these days.
You, I know.
[inhales] Them…
-[grunts] -…don't know.
Oh shit.
[Tommy] Where are we going?
[Preeya] Ah, too many questions.
[man] You know who I work for?
translation.fr: Tu sais pour qui je bosse ?

translation.en: Interpol, police of the world.
We know your Triad is meeting with Ku An Qi, a known terrorist.
translation.fr:
Ta Triade rencontre Ku An Qi,
une terroriste notoire.

translation.en: When?
And where?
[whispers] Good luck.
That means, fuck off.
Both of you.
You wanna have fun?
The Vie Hotel, tomorrow.
You might wanna call in the cleaners.
I thought he gave you the information.
translation.fr: Il ne t'a pas donné l'information ?

translation.en: The actual cleaners. He soiled himself.
translation.fr: Il faut le nettoyer. Il s'est fait dessus.

translation.en: [Tommy] Uh, Preeya, meet the boys.
Boys, this is, uh, Preeya.
'Sup. Lu Xin.
-Lu, is that a "Sin" or a "Xin"? -Is that supposed to be a funny joke?
translation.fr:
- C'est "Sin" ou "Xin" ?
- C'est censé être une blague ?

translation.en: -What's his problem? -Don't worry. He's cool.
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi, son problème ?
- Il est cool.

translation.en: Uh, this is my man, Kai.
-[Kai, in Thai] Hello. -[in Thai] Hello.
[in English] See? Someone's got manners.
-Where's your sister? -Oh, she's not here.
translation.fr:
- Où est ta sœur ?
- Pas là.

translation.en: That's too bad. I love Jen.
Anywho. Hear you boys are on a suicide mission.
translation.fr:
Enfin bref,
vous partez en mission suicide.

translation.en: What the fuck, Thomas. You told her?
It's the only way she'd help. I have to tell her everything.
translation.fr:
Je devais lui dire
pour qu'elle nous aide. J'aime savoir où je mets les pieds.

translation.en: Yeah, I like to know what I'm getting into.
translation.fr: J'aime savoir où je mets les pieds.

translation.en: Due diligence.
If you know, then why are you helping?
translation.fr: Si tu le sais, pourquoi tu nous aides ?

translation.en: I don't mind a little action. It's part of the territory.
translation.fr: Un peu d'action, ça fait partie du boulot.

translation.en: This woman you're dealing with, serious shit. Lots of people dying.
translation.fr:
Cette femme, c'est du sérieux.
Plein de gens meurent.

translation.en: She needs to be stopped.
Can you get this?
Let me make some calls.
Enjoy your shopping, boys.
Keep your mouth shut.
Shopping?
The fuck?
-[Tommy] Thank you. -[Lu Xin speaking Thai]
-[Kai] Tommy? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
Tommy ? - Oui.
- Comment tu l'as connue ?

translation.en: How do you know her again?
So I was actually here five years ago, and someone stole my Louis V backpack.
translation.fr:
Je suis venu il y a cinq ans
et on a volé mon sac Louis V.

translation.en: They took my wallet, passport, phone, everything.
So I went to the cops to report it, and, uh, the cops didn't do anything.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai signalé aux flics
et ils n'ont rien fait.

translation.en: -So, someone told me to go talk to-- -Uh.
I'm just gonna make this story short and sweet,
in case we ever have to hear it again, okay?
translation.fr: au cas où on la réentende.

translation.en: He got his shit jacked, and he doesn't know anything about her.
translation.fr:
Il s'est fait voler
et il ne sait rien sur elle.

translation.en: Okay, guys. Look, she's our only hookup.
translation.fr:
C'est notre seul contact.
On a besoin de ça.

translation.en: -We need this. -[Preeya] And beggars can't be choosers.
translation.fr:
C'est notre seul contact.
On a besoin de ça. Vous n'avez pas le choix.

translation.en: -[Tommy] Did you get it? -[Preeya] Yes, every goddamn thing.
-[Tommy] See? -[sniffs]
Thank you!
Listen. I know it's none of my business.
translation.fr: Je sais que ça ne me regarde pas.

translation.en: But, you know, I'm fond of this one. So I got to tell you guys that your plan--
translation.fr:
Mais je l'aime bien
et je dois vous dire que votre plan…

translation.en: Is none of your business.
Relax, big guy.
-[chuckles] -[Preeya] We're on the same team.
translation.fr: On est dans la même équipe.

translation.en: There is no way you're getting that hardware into the Vie Hotel.
translation.fr:
Vous ne pourrez pas introduire
le matos dans l'hôtel.

translation.en: It's locked down tight, and the only way in is through the front.
translation.fr:
C'est très bien surveillé
et on n'entre que par l'avant.

translation.en: I don't like this. We need to rethink it.
translation.fr: Je n'aime pas ça. Il faut tout revoir.

translation.en: All right. I'll take care of it.
No. Tomorrow, we're all going. We're gonna get Jenny's killer together.
translation.fr:
Demain, on ira tous.
On attrapera l'assassin de Jenny.

translation.en: Jen's dead?
Uh, yeah. Our target took her out.
Now it's our turn.
Shit.
I'm so sorry.
I can help you get in.
translation.fr: Je peux vous aider à entrer.

translation.en: It's dangerous.
I know.
Security there is tight. We can use that to our advantage.
translation.fr:
La sécurité est renforcée.
On peut en tirer profit.

translation.en: We?
[Preeya] Morning, boys.
Hey. Thanks.
Is this your idea of a joke?
Trust me.
This is 007 shit.
We're good.
Okay. Be careful with these.
[Preeya] Wow. What's so special about them?
-Magic. -Come on. Let's go.
translation.fr:
- De la magie.
- Allez, on y va.

translation.en: We're gonna get justice for her.
[Lu Xin] What do you think?
You don't want to know, Lu.
Then we're thinking the same thing.
translation.fr: On se dit la même chose.

translation.en: Come on.
[Tommy] Okay. Whoa, whoa! What did we do? We didn't do anything!
Goddamn!
[Preeya] A bit much, isn't it?
Are you guys seeing this?
[scoffs] Looks like a dipshit nobody.
[Tommy] Ah.
[guard 2] Get up.
-All right. Easy. Easy. -[Tommy] Can I talk to your manager?
translation.fr:
- Du calme.
- Vous êtes le manager ? Du calme.

translation.en: Hey, we're just on holiday.
-[Preeya grunts] -[Tommy] We're valued customers.
One-star Yelp review on the way!
translation.fr: Vous n'aurez qu'une étoile sur Yelp !

translation.en: Agent Zulu.
Let the hotel security handle that. You just focus on…
translation.fr:
Laissez la sécurité s'en charger.
Concentrez-vous…

translation.en: [in Thai] Why are you here?
You're wasting your time.
It's for Songkran, the Thai water festival.
translation.fr:
C'est pour Songkran,
la fête de l'eau en Thaïlande.

translation.en: That's not until April.
Yeah. Well, we like to be prepared.
Now you're gonna have to reorganize her bag.
You for real? [Tommy] Yes, I'm for real.
-[guard] Bullshit! -[Tommy] Look at all this mess.
Stay here.
[in English] Where is our fucking visual?
-I'm working on it. -[Zulu] Our gear is still working.
Whatever is happening is only affecting the hotel.
translation.fr: Ce qui arrive ne touche que l'hôtel.

translation.en: Something is going down.
This is not good.
-[sighs] -[man] Zulu! Zulu!
[Ku An Qi, in Thai] You are my men now.
-Close your eyes. -What?
Just close your eyes.
-Trust me. -[guard] Come on!
Come on. Let's get out of here.
-[elevator dings] -See you in a second.
-Good timing. -Yeah. Of course it is.
Ah, fuck. Who the fuck did this?
-[Zulu] Hands where I can see 'em. -[gun cocks]
Zama?
Lu.
What are you doing here?
-[Kai] You know her? -Yeah, we met in London.
I was pushing some Aston Martins, and my broker turned out to be Interpol's finest.
translation.fr:
Un deal d'Aston Martin
avec Interpol à mon insu.

translation.en: -Look, hey, these bodies-- -Get down on your knees!
This wasn't us. So you just tripped and fell into a massacre?
translation.fr:
- Ce n'est pas nous.
- C'est un pur hasard ?

translation.en: Zama, you know me. You think I would do this?
translation.fr: Tu me connais. Je ferais ça ?

translation.en: There's a lot I don't know about you, Lu.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas tout sur toi.

translation.en: This is bigger and more complicated than you can imagine.
translation.fr:
C'est plus important et compliqué
qu'il n'y paraît.

translation.en: Try me. The fate of the world.
-I didn't come to fuck around. -Don't!
Agent Boucher. I have two suspects. I need backup.
translation.fr:
Agent Boucher, j'ai deux suspects.
Envoyez des renforts.

translation.en: Boucher?
Whoever got them probably got your team.
translation.fr: Votre équipe a dû y passer aussi.

translation.en: Interlace your fingers behind your head, -and get down on the floor. -[chuckling]
translation.fr:
Croisez les doigts derrière la tête
et à terre.

translation.en: -I don't want to hurt you. -Kai. Don't.
translation.fr:
- Je ne veux pas vous blesser.
- Ne fais pas ça.

translation.en: Listen to your friend. He seems to be the reasonable one.
translation.fr:
Écoute ton pote.
Il est plus raisonnable.

translation.en: First time I've heard that. Lower your gun.
translation.fr:
On ne lui a jamais dit ça.
Baisse ton arme.

translation.en: -What the fuck happened here? -We're working on it.
translation.fr:
- Que s'est-il passé ?
- On y travaille.

translation.en: Let her go. She's not the threat. Please.
translation.fr: Lâche-la. Elle n'est pas une menace.

translation.en: Look, it's clear that none of us are the bad guys.
translation.fr: Aucun de nous n'est un méchant.

translation.en: But they are coming.
[exhales] Who's coming? The entire hotel.
[Lu Xin] On your six!
-I got it. -I'm just looking out for you.
-Because that's always been your MO. -Here we go again.
translation.fr:
- C'est ton mode opératoire.
- C'est reparti.

translation.en: You could just say sorry.
-[Zulu] What? [laughing] -Sorry works just fine.
[Preeya] Did you guys, like, used to date or--
Zan.
Assassin.
Why are you here?
[Zan] They offered me a deal.
The Wu Assassin in exchange for power.
translation.fr: Le Wu Assassin en échange du pouvoir.

translation.en: [Tommy] Where we going?
-Fuck. Come with me -Go!
[Lu Xin] Shit!
Fuck! Get in the car!
Looks like you're not the only special one.
[Lu Xin] Look out!
[Tommy] Hey. Hey, hey, take it easy.
[grunts] Fuck.
[Tommy] It's locked!
Go!
Door says push, not pull.
What?
Hold up. Where's Kai?
Don't worry about Kai, all right?
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas pour lui.

translation.en: Oh shit. You okay?
Yo, you good?
Zan?
-[Lu Xin] Yo, we gotta go. Come on. -My van's still here. Come on!
translation.fr:
- On se tire. Allez.
- Ma fourgonnette est toujours là.

translation.en: Get in.
-[Lu Xin] What happened back there? -What happened in here?
translation.fr:
- Il s'est passé quoi là-bas ?
- Et là ?

translation.en: This is chaotic.
You know what to do.
If only you would've listened to me when I told you something's sketchy.
translation.fr:
Tu aurais dû m'écouter
quand j'ai dit que c'était louche.

translation.en: We didn't have another lead.
[in Thai] Take them down.
Get me out of here now.
-[in English] Shit. -What?
In case you thought we lost 'em, we didn't.
translation.fr: On ne les a pas semés au final.

translation.en: -Hold tight. -[brakes screeching]
Can you get to Khaosan Road?
-We have another safe house there. -Yeah.
[Lu Xin] Shit.
[Zulu] It's the end of the road.
translation.fr: On est au bout de la route.

translation.en: Shit.
[man] Get out of the car!
-She's locking down the city. -What are we gonna do?
translation.fr:
- Elle quadrille la ville.
- On fait quoi ?

translation.en: Sail away.
I'm really starting to strongly dislike you.
translation.fr: Je commence à ne pas t'aimer.

translation.en: We get to the canal. Take a boat up the Chao Phraya.
translation.fr:
On prend le canal.
On remonte le Chao Phraya.

translation.en: That plan is just--
[Ku An Qi, in Thai] Stop firing.
Get them out of the car. Bring them to me.
[in English] I changed my mind. I like the plan.
translation.fr:
J'ai changé d'avis sur le plan.
Je l'adore.

translation.en: [Tommy] Yeah. River, boat.
-If you wanna join me, guns are up top. -[Preeya] Come on.
translation.fr:
Si vous voulez m'aider,
les armes sont en hauteur. Allez.

translation.en: Shoot it! Let's get these fuckers!
translation.fr: Regardez. On va se les farcir !

translation.en: Ah, fuck. I'm all out.
[Lu Xin] They're trying to burn us alive. We gotta go!
translation.fr: Ils veulent nous cramer. On se tire !

translation.en: [Zulu] Okay. Everybody, follow me.
♪ So I, I only spit fire and dope ♪ ♪ So later on you can go quote ♪
Yo, what's up?
-♪ Never lose sight, I'm true dude ♪ -Good timing.
Never seen that before.
I picked up a few things since you ghosted me.
translation.fr:
J'ai appris des trucs
depuis ta disparition.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, if I'd have stayed, it would've been behind bars, wouldn't it?
translation.fr:
Si j'étais resté,
j'aurais fini en taule, non ?

translation.en: This way. The river.
[Lu Xin] Get out the way!
[Preeya] Get to the boat!
[Lu Xin] Get out the way!
[in Thai] Get off my boat!
[Lu Xin] Kai! Look out!
-[Lu Xin] Go, go! -[boat engine accelerating]
-[Kai] Get us out of here! -[Tommy] Come on!
Hurry, they're catching up!
[Lu Xin] Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
We're almost there. It's just up ahead.
translation.fr: On y est presque. C'est droit devant.

translation.en: [in Thai] You are back.
I didn't know if we'd ever see you.
translation.fr: Je ne savais pas si on se reverrait.

translation.en: [Tommy, in English] Everyone's excited to see you.
translation.fr: Tout le monde est content de te voir.

translation.en: So this is your home.
-It's been a while since I was last here. -[Tommy] What about your family?
translation.fr:
- Je suis partie il y a longtemps.
- Et ta famille ?

translation.en: They were long gone before that.
What's this?
Magical protection.
If they don't want you, you can't pass.
translation.fr:
Si tu n'es pas le bienvenu,
tu ne passes pas.

translation.en: I guess they want us in.
This is the home of a shaman.
He knows everything about the supernatural.
translation.fr: Il sait tout sur le surnaturel.

translation.en: If anyone might know what's going on, it's Chatree.
translation.fr:
Si quelqu'un sait quelque chose,
c'est Chatree.

translation.en: [in Thai] You used to call me a charlatan, didn't you?
translation.fr: Tu disais que j'étais un charlatan, non  ?

translation.en: Uncle!
[in English] It's nice to meet everyone.
You all must be starving.
-[Zulu] 100% -[Lu Xin] How'd you know?
[Chatree] Usually, I am the one showing hospitality.
translation.fr:
D'habitude,
c'est moi qui fais preuve d'hospitalité.

translation.en: [Kai] You are.
It is my honor to have such an esteemed guest.
translation.fr:
C'est un honneur
d'avoir un invité de marque.

translation.en: What do you know about Pan Gu?
In Thailand, we don't talk business on an empty stomach.
translation.fr:
En Thaïlande,
on ne discute pas le ventre vide.

translation.en: Is that a saying?
One that I just made up.
There are people after us.
There will always be people after you.
Here we are well-protected.
We have weapons.
[grunts] Is this a prank?
But it is funny that this bracelet is yours.
translation.fr: C'est drôle que ce soit ton bracelet.

translation.en: But it is not for you.
translation.fr: Mais il n'est pas pour toi.

translation.en: You speak like Yoda, old man.
Baby Yoda.
I am only 50. [chuckling]
Pan Gu.
Uncle.
William Pan, he wasn't, uh, completely honest with you.
translation.fr:
William Pan n'a pas été
totalement honnête avec vous.

translation.en: Yeah? No shit.
Pan and Ku An Qi are opposite forces.
translation.fr: Pan et Ku An Qi sont des forces opposées.

translation.en: Yin
and yang.
But they are not in opposition to each other.
translation.fr: Mais ils ne sont pas en opposition.

translation.en: They are two halves of a whole.
translation.fr: Ce sont les deux moitiés d'un tout.

translation.en: They have been working in harmony
through all their births, lives, deaths, rebirths
translation.fr:
à travers toutes leurs naissances,
vies, morts, renaissances,

translation.en: towards one goal,
reforming back to Pan Gu,
the first man.
And using their power, they will remake the world in their image.
translation.fr:
Grâce à leurs pouvoirs,
ils façonneront le monde à leur image.

translation.en: And now that the Dao is broken,
they have the opportunity.
How will they do that?
By harnessing the Chi of the one who split them.
translation.fr:
En captant le Chi de celui
qui les a séparés.

translation.en: The Wu Assassin.
The two of them each have a piece of their old Essence.
translation.fr:
Ils ont tous les deux
un fragment de leur Essence.

translation.en: The only constant they have,
forged from the stone of the temple where they were split.
translation.fr:
forgée à partir de la pierre du temple
où ils ont été séparés.

translation.en: If they can infuse the pieces with Kai's Chi,
translation.fr:
S'ils peuvent imprégner
leurs fragments avec son Chi,

translation.en: they will be able to connect the halves.
translation.fr: ils pourront joindre les deux moitiés.

translation.en: Does it look something like this?
Where did you get that from?
I mean, it doesn't matter.
If it's part of Ku, we'll just destroy it--
translation.fr: C'est une partie de Ku, on le détruit…

translation.en: -[all yelling] -[Chatree] It can't be destroyed!
I've had quite enough, thank you.
This… This whole thing is just crazy. [sighs]
translation.fr: C'est de la folie tout ça.

translation.en: -[sighs] -You okay?
I'm just trying to wrap my head around
this supernatural shit and the world ending.
translation.fr:
ces histoires surnaturelles
de fin du monde.

translation.en: What did you do when you first found out?
translation.fr: Tu as fait quoi quand tu l'as appris ?

translation.en: I had just shot a Russian gangster in the face.
translation.fr:
J'avais tiré dans la tête
d'un gangster russe.

translation.en: So you could say it was a little bit weird.
Honestly?
I poured myself a big fucking drink.
translation.fr: Je me suis servi un verre.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Ugh. This is terrible.
Can't be worse than that Chinese whiskey we had in Brick Lane.
translation.fr:
Pas pire que le whisky chinois
qu'on a bu à Brick Lane.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, that was… that was part of a job, so…
-[sighs] -Is that what I was to you?
Just part of the job.
I can taste when you're lying.
Training?
Meditation.
[Chatree] My meditation is meditation.
-[Kai] You're not worried about us losing? -[Chatree] No, I'm not.
translation.fr:
- Vous n'avez pas peur qu'on perde ?
- Pas du tout.

translation.en: Because if that should happen, Pan Gu would remake the world,
translation.fr:
Si ça devait arriver,
Pan Gu remodèlerait le monde

translation.en: and we would simply be the forgotten dreams of a butterfly.
translation.fr:
et nous ne serions
que les rêves oubliés d'un papillon.

translation.en: Sounds peaceful.
But that is the one thing
that the Wu Assassin can never have.
translation.fr: que le Wu Assassin n'aura jamais.

translation.en: He may have friends that he's shutting out.
translation.fr: Il a des amis qu'il repousse.

translation.en: It's my responsibility to protect them.
[Chatree] You have lost one.
And now you're trying everything
translation.fr: Et là, tu fais tout ton possible

translation.en: to avoid that pain again.
They're all I have left.
But Pan Gu seeks to control all.
translation.fr: Mais Pan Gu veut tout contrôler.

translation.en: What do you want, Wu Assassin?
We'll stop him.
We'll stop him. We'll make plans.
translation.fr: On l'arrêtera. On élaborera un plan.

translation.en: There's a Jeep there.
translation.fr: Il y a une Jeep ci.

translation.en: There is the path that leads to the main road.
translation.fr:
Il y a un chemin qui mène
à la grande route.

translation.en: From there, it's an easy ride to wherever.
translation.fr: Et tu peux aller où tu veux.

translation.en: You did not come here to train
or reflect.
You came here to leave
translation.fr: Tu es venu ici pour partir

translation.en: after everyone went to bed.
Last time I was here was, um…
translation.fr: La dernière fois que je suis venue…

translation.en: ten years ago.
translation.fr: c'était il y a dix ans.

translation.en: Family had a farm by the river.
translation.fr: On avait une ferme près du fleuve.

translation.en: There was a bad flood.
translation.fr: Il y a eu une crue.

translation.en: Water came suddenly, and just like that…
translation.fr: L'eau est entrée et tout d'un coup…

translation.en: my mum, my dad,
and my sister were gone.
No magical attack.
No clash for the world. It was, uh,
just an accident.
There's nothing I can do to bring my family back,
translation.fr:
Je ne peux rien faire
pour les ramener à la vie

translation.en: but I thought I could bring you some peace for Jen.
translation.fr:
mais je pensais t'apporter
du réconfort pour Jenny.

translation.en: And that is why I'm helping.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je vous aide.

translation.en: At least there's something you can do.
translation.fr: Au moins, tu peux faire quelque chose.

translation.en: You have Kai,
Lu Xin.
Me…
I'm all alone.
I'm sorry.
I didn't know.
Well, you never asked.
This can't be real.
[Ku An Qi] It isn't.
[William] It's the version of the village in your mind
translation.fr:
C'est la version du village
qui existe en toi

translation.en: from when you were a child.
But we can make it like this again.
We can make it into whatever we want.
translation.fr: On peut le façonner à notre guise.

translation.en: [William] Pan Gu is all.
[in Thai] Mum, Dad, Ratana!
-[chuckles] -[Ratana] I miss you.
[William] You can be together again… -[sniffles] -…forever.
translation.fr: Vous pouvez être réunis pour toujours.

translation.en: All we need is one small thing.
translation.fr: Il nous faut seulement une chose.

translation.en: The Wu Assassin's Chi.
[whispering, echoing] It'll be easy.
-[in English] What are you doing? -I had no choice.
translation.fr:
- Tu fais quoi ?
- Je n'ai pas le choix.

translation.en: -What did they promise you? -[grunts]
Get up.
What's going on?
What do you think? [grunts]
I fuck with these.
-There's more down there. Let's go. -[Lu Xin] Yo! Tommy, hold up!
translation.fr:
- Il y en a d'autres en bas.
- Tommy, attends !

translation.en: I'll get Preeya.
-What? -Be careful, okay?
I am getting really, really sick of this shit.
translation.fr: J'en ai marre de ces conneries.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Tommy, get the Jeep.
We'll hold them off while Zama and Preeya get here.
translation.fr: On les retient en attendant les filles.

translation.en: Preeya betrayed us.
-No. She wouldn't. -What? She took Ku An Qi's necklace.
translation.fr:
- Impossible.
- Preeya a pris le collier de Ku An Qi.

translation.en: -Fuck. -Lu, get Zama. Tommy, the car!
translation.fr:
- Putain.
- Va chercher Zama. Tommy, la caisse !

translation.en: -Hold on. We're stronger together. -Just do as I say!
translation.fr:
- On est plus forts ensemble.
- Obéis-moi !

translation.en: Shit.
Oh shit.
Preeya betrayed us. We gotta go now.
translation.fr: Preeya nous a trahis. On part.

translation.en: I know. I saw her leave with Pan's men. Let's go.
translation.fr: Je l'ai vue partir avec les hommes de Pan.

translation.en: Calm down, boys.
All right. Let's go, guys!
[Zulu] Come on, let's go.
Come on, everybody in.
You can no longer be stopped.
It's in your hands now. Go!
Don't let Pan Gu reform!
translation.fr: Ne laisse pas Pan Gu se reformer !

translation.en: -No! Chatree! -[Lu Xin] Get in the car!
-[Zulu] We need to go! -[Lu Xin] Drive, Tommy!
[Kai] We shouldn't have left Chatree.
translation.fr: On n'aurait pas dû le laisser.

translation.en: -Should have listened to me. -There wasn't anything to listen to.
translation.fr:
- Tu aurais dû m'écouter.
- Il n'y avait rien à écouter.

translation.en: -I made a decision. -Yeah. Nothing new there, Kai.
translation.fr:
- J'ai fait un choix.
- Rien de nouveau.

translation.en: -I'm leading us. -No, you're not. You're shutting us out.
translation.fr:
- Je suis le meneur.
- Non, tu nous écartes.

translation.en: Guys, let's focus on what the fuck we're gonna do now.
translation.fr:
Concentrons-nous
sur ce que nous devons faire.

translation.en: I'm sorry. You have no right to say shit.
translation.fr: Pardon. Tu n'as pas ton mot à dire.

translation.en: -What the fuck you talking about? -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
translation.fr:
- Comment ça ?
- Tu ne vois pas ?

translation.en: Your little girlfriend that you brought into our inner circle betrayed us.
translation.fr:
La meuf que tu as fait venir
nous a trahis.

translation.en: [Tommy] You gonna put that on me?
Sure, you weren't on the lookout either. You were occupied fucking Zama.
translation.fr:
Tu n'étais pas sur tes gardes.
Tu t'amusais avec Zama.

translation.en: And, Kai, like, what the fuck? What were you doing? What was your plan?
translation.fr:
Et Kai, tu faisais quoi ?
C'était quoi, ton plan ?

translation.en: My plan was to kill Pan and Ku myself.
-Like I should have done. -Yeah? Great, 'cause you're always right.
translation.fr:
- Comme j'aurais dû le faire.
- Tu as toujours raison.

translation.en: We don't need you. I don't need any of you. True! I'm going myself.
translation.fr:
- Je n'ai pas besoin de vous.
- C'est vrai ! J'y vais seul.

translation.en: -Get the fuck out of here! -[Zulu] Just stop it!
All of you. You're acting like little children.
translation.fr: Tous les trois. On dirait des gosses.

translation.en: Do I need to remind you
that we need to stop a god from destroying reality?
translation.fr:
qu'on doit empêcher un dieu
de détruire la réalité ?

translation.en: You say you're a family.
You're not acting like a family,
not one that's about to save the world.
translation.fr: Votre famille ne va pas sauver le monde.

translation.en: Because you cannot even take care of each other.
translation.fr:
Vous ne pouvez même pas veiller
les uns sur les autres.

translation.en: [Zulu] If you can…
just get over your anger…
your guilt…
Your ego.
We might actually have a chance. We really might.
translation.fr: Et on aura nos chances. Vraiment.

translation.en: So, let's remind ourselves.
Why are we here?
For Jenny.
She's right.
[sighs] We're all fucking idiots.
I'm the idiot.
I'm a fucking idiot.
[sighs] For Jenny.
-For Jenny. -For Jenny.
Now we're getting somewhere.
When we were at Pan's temple,
translation.fr:
Quand on était au temple,
j'ai vu le symbole de séparation

translation.en: I saw that splitting symbol in a photo of a factory at another dig site.
translation.fr:
Quand on était au temple,
j'ai vu le symbole de séparation sur la photo d'une usine
dans un autre site.

translation.en: That's where the stone came from, so we gotta go to that dig site.
translation.fr: La pierre vient de là, on doit y aller.

translation.en: But they only have half of the symbol completed, so, like,
translation.fr: Ils n'ont que la moitié du symbole,

translation.en: they're gonna need your power.
No. We shouldn't risk it.
translation.fr: On ne devrait pas prendre le risque.

translation.en: No, no. We should. We should.
Because they'll come after all of us if we don't stop them.
translation.fr:
Ils s'en prendront à nous
si on ne les arrête pas.

translation.en: This ends tonight.
translation.fr: On arrête les frais ce soir…

translation.en: If you all agree.
As long as we're smart about it.
You can count me in.
-We are all the Wu Assassins. -[chuckles]
translation.fr: On est tous le Wu Assassin.

translation.en: Shit.
-Let's go kill a god. -[Tommy] Let's do it.
translation.fr:
- Allons tuer un dieu.
- On y va.

translation.en: There are a lot of guards here.
translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup de gardes.

translation.en: [Tommy] They'll know we're coming.
They already know I'm here.
translation.fr: Ils savent que je suis là.

translation.en: [Zulu] In that case…
-[gun cocks] -Boom.
[Ku An Qi] This is where the first Wu Assassin tore us apart.
translation.fr:
C'est ici que le premier Wu Assassin
nous a séparés.

translation.en: [William] They'll be here soon.
[Ku An Qi] This Wu Assassin is particularly hard to kill.
translation.fr: Ce Wu Assassin est très coriace.

translation.en: I got this. [chuckles]
[Preeya] This thing killed my uncle.
translation.fr: Ce truc a tué mon oncle.

translation.en: How many more people have to die before I get my family back?
translation.fr:
Combien de gens mourront
avant que je retrouve ma famille ?

translation.en: Your problem, child, is that you see death as the end.
translation.fr:
Ton problème, mon enfant,
c'est que tu vois la mort comme une fin.

translation.en: -You'll be with them soon enough. -[coughs]
[William] Along with all living things.
translation.fr: avec tout ce qui est vivant.

translation.en: [Tommy] That's where the stone is melted. Those are the sleeping quarters.
translation.fr:
C'est là que la pierre est formée.
Ce sont les dortoirs.

translation.en: -Those are the main pressing machines. -[Lu Xin] How do you know?
translation.fr:
- Ce sont les presses.
- Comment tu le sais ?

translation.en: [Tommy] Wikipedia.
We gotta be careful. They still need you for the ritual, so…
translation.fr:
Il faut être prudent.
Ils ont besoin de toi pour le rituel.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Get down! Move!
-What do you want to do? -We're splitting up.
translation.fr:
- Que veux-tu faire ?
- On se sépare.

translation.en: Yeah. We're not divided. We're dividing them.
translation.fr: On n'est pas divisés. On les divise.

translation.en: I got Zan. Lu, the Beast.
translation.fr: Je m'occupe de Zan. Lu, la Bête.

translation.en: You guys find Pan and Ku.
-[gunshot] -[Lu Xin] Fuck!
Try this. It's got good range.
translation.fr: Essaye. Ça a une bonne portée.

translation.en: -Be careful. -Okay.
[Lu Xin] Let's finish this.
I promised myself
translation.fr:
Je me suis promis d'éliminer
tout ce qui est lié

translation.en: I'd erase anything related to when I was a pawn of your father's.
translation.fr:
Je me suis promis d'éliminer
tout ce qui est lié à mon passé avec ton père.
En commençant par Jenny.

translation.en: We started with Jenny.
translation.fr:
à mon passé avec ton père.
En commençant par Jenny.

translation.en: And it ends when I kill you, Assassin.
translation.fr:
J'en aurai fini
quand tu seras mort, assassin.

translation.en: You're not the one I'm looking for.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas vous que je cherche.

translation.en: Well, we are who you've got, bitch.
The necklace isn't here. None of this matters if we can't find it.
translation.fr:
Le collier n'est pas là.
Ça ne sert à rien sans ça.

translation.en: They're not fools, Tommy. Let's go find the others.
translation.fr:
Ils ne sont pas bêtes.
Rejoignons les autres.

translation.en: You fucking piece of shit.
-The fuck were you thinking? -Wait. No. Stop.
Tell me they mind-controlled you.
They told me I could see my family again,
translation.fr: Ils m'ont dit que je reverrais ma famille,

translation.en: and I made a mistake, and I'm so sorry. So sorry!
I messed up.
It's okay. It's okay.
Mastery over the body has its perks.
translation.fr: La maîtrise du corps a ses bons côtés.

translation.en: [Preeya whispering] Fucking magic.
-[Kai] Give up. -[Zan] Never.
Get up!
[straining] This isn't for me.
This is for all of us.
[William] Welcome.
-Lu Xin! -[William] He'll be fine.
Your friends took out Ku.
But you
will not be so lucky.
[in deep voice] I am Pan Gu, the first man.
translation.fr: Je suis Pan Gu, le premier homme.

translation.en: Control of mind, body, and soul.
translation.fr:
Contrôle de l'esprit,
du corps et de l'âme.

translation.en: Lu. Lu, wait. Hey.
Brother. It's not you!
-[Kai] Pan Gu! -[Lu Xin] Kai.
-What the fuck? -[groans]
The trouble is, you are but one man,
translation.fr:
Le problème,
c'est que tu n'es qu'un homme,

translation.en: while I am all.
translation.fr: alors que je suis tous les hommes.

translation.en: Brother, I don't want to do this.
translation.fr: Frère, je ne veux pas faire ça.

translation.en: [in demon voice] Thank you for your sacrifice.
Fight it.
We can't do this without you.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas y arriver sans toi.

translation.en: Fight it, brother! Wake up!
[Kai] Come on, Lu! Get up!
We need you, brother!
[Preeya grunting] Tommy.
-[Zulu] Come on. You can do it. -Fucking bitch.
translation.fr:
- Tu peux le faire.
- La sale pute.

translation.en: I think we've got bigger problems. Let's go.
translation.fr: On a de plus gros problèmes. Allons-y.

translation.en: Let's go.
What the fuck happened? Is that you? Hey.
translation.fr:
- Il s'est passé quoi ?
- C'est toi ?

translation.en: Of course, it's fucking me. Who else would it be?
translation.fr: Bien sûr que c'est moi. Qui d'autre ?

translation.en: [chuckling] Nice.
Let's kill this motherfucker.
Oh, fuck, yeah.
-Kai! -[Tommy] Lu, what's going on?
-[Kai] Ah, Lu! Ah! -It's sinking!
Grab that.
Kai! Heads up!
-I can't hold. -[Lu Xin] Hold on. Hold on, Kai!
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas tenir. Tiens bon.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Stay there. Zama!
-Yeah? -Follow me.
Tie that!
Gotcha.
-This is serious, man. -No shit!
-You guys know knots? -We're about to find out.
translation.fr:
- Tu sais faire des nœuds ?
- On va le découvrir.

translation.en: Girl Scout those ropes together.
[Tommy] We'll bring 'em up with up this. Let me know when there's enough rope.
translation.fr:
On va les remonter avec ça.
Dis-moi s'il y a assez de corde.

translation.en: [Lu Xin] Kai, this isn't working.
Come up with something. You're the Wu Assassin.
translation.fr: Fais quelque chose. Tu es le Wu Assassin.

translation.en: Come on! Grab it! Grab it!
-Zama? -Almost there.
Let me know when you guys are good.
Start pulling!
Ah! It's about time.
All right, guys. I need help. Come on! Come on!
[grunting] Come on, Zama.
[Tommy] Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
[Kai] It's over.
I know a really nice, safe passage out. Come on.
translation.fr: Je connais un passage sûr. Allez.

translation.en: [Kai] Food's ready, guys.
Looks good.
Hold it, man. First, a toast.
To family. New and old.
translation.fr: à la famille actuelle et passée.

translation.en: [all] To family. Cheers!
To Jenny.
[all] To Jenny.
[Preeya] So, Kai, what's next?
translation.fr: Alors, Kai. C'est quoi, la suite ?

translation.en: -I'm off to fight a necromancer. -Ooh!
I guess we're going on vacation then.
-We? I thought you could handle yourself. -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
Oh wow. Here we go with the talk.
Look, look, look, just 'cause I kicked your ass,
all of us saw it, but we don't have to talk about it.
translation.fr:
tout le monde a été témoin
mais n'en parlons pas.

translation.en: -[Kai] You wanna spar? You wanna try me? -Do I want to spar?
translation.fr:
- Tu veux te battre ?
- Si je veux me battre ?

translation.en: I don't got to prove anything to you!
You're the Wu Assassin. I'm just the Lu Assassin.
translation.fr:
Tu es le Wu Assassin.
Je suis le Lu Assassin.

translation.en: -[Tommy] You gonna let him say that? -Oh!
Okay. Okay.
-[Zulu] Oh my God. That's crazy. -[Tommy] Guys, guys, guys.
translation.fr:
- Purée.
- Je peux le faire ! C'est trop facile.

translation.en: -[Tommy] Let's get him! -[Lu Xin] Ah!
-[Kai] Whoa, whoa, whoa! -[Tommy] He's going in. Get him in the water.
translation.fr: Il y va. À la flotte !
